TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReadOnlyAnnotatable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IReadOnlyAnnotatable

summary.para: A class that supports annotations. Annotations allow for arbitrary metadata to be stored on an object.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.
